document_data.name: Worldfall
document_data.affected: Large tracts of land or cities
document_data.mainbody: A '''worldfall''' was an occurrence where the planar energies of the [[multiverse]] aligned in such a way that large areas of land―or even entire cities―could transfer from one [[plane of existence]] to another.
document_data.Description: Whenever a worldfall occurred, anyone within the affected area were transported along with the surrounding terrain.
document_data.Activities: Cities built by the [[eladrin]] often utilized worldfalls to travel to and from the [[Feywild]].
document_data.Notable Worldfalls: * [[Shinaelestra]], the eladrin city that shifted away to the Howling Forest on some unknown world at midnight every day, and returned to the Feywild at dawn.
